message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think you'll find it very valuable.  Would you be interested in purchasing it for $130?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $110 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down a little. How about we meet in the middle at $120?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. Would you be willing to come down a bit further?
